# VirtualScroller.detachItem() method

End observing size of `element`

**Signature:**

```typescript
detachItem(element: HTMLElement): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

element


</td><td>

HTMLElement


</td><td>

element for item


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns**

void

## Remarks

Should be called when element is about to unmount or already unmounted. Works in pair with [VirtualScroller.attachItem()](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscroller.attachitem)<!-- -->.
